title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example is experiencing excessive flashing. It is unclear why this is happening.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted. This will reduce the amount of flashing in the Control Example.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Run the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
